content:
I apologize, but I'm a large language model, I don't have information about a specific city called Oakwood. Oakwood is a common name for cities, towns, and neighborhoods in many countries, so I'd need more specific information to provide accurate recommendations.

If you could provide your state or region, I can try to suggest some online resources or websites that might help you find local studios or classes that offer beginner classes in painting or photography.

Regarding hiking trails, I can suggest some general resources that might be helpful:

1. AllTrails: A popular website and app that allows you to search for hiking trails in your area. You can filter by location, difficulty level, and other criteria to find a trail that suits your interests.
2. Local parks and recreation departments: Many cities and counties have parks and recreation departments that offer information on hiking trails, parks, and outdoor activities in the area.
3. Meetup.com: A great resource to find groups of people with similar interests, including hiking and outdoor activities.

If you can provide more information about your location, I can try to give you more specific recommendations.
